Melasidae Fleming, 1821
, Suppl. Four., Fifth, Sixth Edit. Ency. Brit., Prel. Diss. Hist. Sci. Illus. Engr. , 5: 49. Type genus: Melasis Olivier, 1790 . Muona & Alaruikka (2007: 32) submitted an application to conserve usage of Eucnemidae Eschscholtz, 1829 over
Melasidae Fleming, 1821
. However, This Case (NO. 2938) is probably still not closed, since the status of this application is not published. — — Thomson, 1864 , Skan. Col. , Syn. Bear. , 4: 44. —— Fleutiaux, 1911 , Annls.
